verses.name: Matthew 16:23
verses.text: But he turned, and said unto Peter, Get thee behind me, Satan: thou art an offence unto me: for thou savourest not the things that be of God, but those that be of men.

verses.name: Matthew 16:24
verses.text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.

verses.name: Matthew 16:25
verses.text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it.
